notes.text: sap.m.ComboBox: On phone selecting an item is called with correct key"
Demo App Order Browser
Enhance messages for descriptions to be used in MessagePopover
Switch theme to Belize for tutorials
m.SelectList and Select: introduce proper focus outline

sap.m.Label get required property from control

' should cast anything to string
